descriptions: ["DescriptionThis spacious four bedroom apartment plus maids room is located on the 22nd floor of the Horizon tower. The amenities of the tower include separate ladies' and gents' gymnasiums, sauna and steam rooms, two swimming pools plus children's splash pool, swimming pool with water jets, landscaped gardens and sunbathing areas on the pool deck. The apartment itself has a fully equipped kitchen as it is rented until November 11, ceramic tiles, well-sized dining and living spaces. If you are looking for a well sized apartment close to Marina Walk and Marina Mall, this is the one you should consider!Dubai Marina was voted one of the most popular areas in Dubai according to 2018 Bayut Real Estate. descriptions:
["Description5 Bedroom Villa
Plot Area:  Starting 11,829 sqft
GSA: 6,620 sqft
Additional External Amenities:
Driver's Room with Bathroom
Fry Kitchen
Store Room
Welcome to Jubail Island. 
A thriving and diverse master planned community surrounded by the tranquility of nature. 
A stylish island oasis of unparalleled beauty; positioned against the backdrop of UAE’s thriving capital city, where amazing architecture will blend seamlessly with the diverse natural environment to provide an unrivaled quality of life that is a dream come true.
A true sense of belonging.
Sprawled across 4,000 hectares of mangrove forests and coastal estuaries with more than 30 km of waterfront, Jubail Island will be home to 6 distinct village communities, with deliberately bespoke, breathtakingly picturesque residential areas and community facilities.
The planning was guided by the following four principles - each a hallmark of successful towns around the world: 
Discovery and Connectivity
Wellness and Activity
Just outside Abu Dhabi - between Yas Island and Saadiyat Island – Jubail Island is a neighborhood unlike any other in the United Arab Emirates.
Located in a protected natural environment of stunning beauty, its surrounding ecosystem supports a diversity of wildlife.
Jubail Island is reality - a stunning refuge within a community waiting to be explored, just outside the vibrant inner city. Its breathtaking landscape plays an integral part of the UAE’s rich and vital ecosystem.
Your journey into this sanctuary away from busy city life begins with a series of beautiful gateway experiences leading into a network of scenic drives, with views to the open water."]

['DescriptionStrategically located between Abu Dhabi and Dubai, AlJurf is setting the pace and will be credited as the destination that introduced a truly unique concept to the UAE market, ushering in a new form of community living, and setting the future of life in Sahel El Emarat.  
Spanning over 380 hectares and boasting 1.6 kms of sea front and another 1.6 km of breakwater on the Arabian Gulf, AlJurf is a unique waterfront mixed-use development. The destination is anticipated to dramatically pave the way for Sahel El Emarat. 
Once completed, AlJurf will feature a range of facilities and amenities, including a world-renowned wellness clinic and retreat, unique residential communities and serviced residences, a marina and a town center encompassing a hotel and retail units. 
This is a second home destination, far from the bustle of urban life. AlJurf Gardens harnesses nature’s raw beauty and combines it with refined heritage-inspired architecture and contemporary design to present a sanctuary of wellness and calm. Secluded residential villas and land plots cluster close to a central community hub in the midst of a nature reserve to reinterpret The Great Past of Tomorrow.

descriptions: ["DescriptionDUBAI MARINA - DAMAC HEIGHTS Fendi Finishing No. of Beds: 2BR + Balcony Area: 1562 sq.ft Floor: High Full Marina view Amenities: - Gym - Sauna - Steam room - Jacuzzi - Swimming pool - Children's playroom - Lounge and games room - Security access control - ample parking spaces - Cinema room This spacious 2-bedroom apartment is situated on a high floor of one of the nicest buildings in Dubai Marina, offering Fendi design, quality finishing and an unbeatable location, you can't go wrong with this investment! The open floor plan is modern and fresh and each room flows organically into the next, and an amazing balcony is found beyond the living area with beautiful view of the Marina The building split between two categories, from ground floor up to 42nd floor called DAMAC Heights units (Signature Units) & from 43rd up to 85th floor called DAMAC Residenza interior Design By FENDI CASA and each one of them will have separate Lobby & elevators. DAMAC Heights has won numerous awards."]
